name: Babel (Alice Bottino)
description:
Join together pieces of your everyday life to build your very own Tower of Babel.

Controls: 
WASD to move
Space to Jump
Mouse to move camera
click to grab objects
Hold and release left click to place object

Credits:
design/programming by alice bottino
design/art by roman muradov
music/sound by dory bavarsky/full color sound records
